name: Defense Services Marketing Council (DSMC)
tag_list: consulting, networking, mocktails-and-defense, defense, technology, marketing, aerospace, space, defenseservicesmarketingcouncil, dsmc, dubai, abu-dhabi, uae, worldwide, security, sponsoring, cyber-security
overview:
The Defense Services Marketing Council is an exclusive, “by invitation only” collaborative organization of business development, public relations and marketing executives who represent Defense, Space & Security related companies and service providers seeking to do business in the Middle East region.

The Council serves primarily as a working-group catalyst in bringing the smartest, most imaginative marketers of the local, regional and global products and services companies together on an ongoing monthly basis to explore best practices and critical issues, and share intelligence on best customers and market trends. ﻿ In addition, through the ‘incubation’ of innovative marketing alliances and partnerships across all the Member and Associate related companies, the Council will help its participants to grow revenue and cultivate referrals from and loyalty of best customers. ﻿ Each of the Council’s monthly gatherings will have an individual company host an event that range from the simple board room lunch with a capabilities presentation to other more in-depth events including moderated panel discussions featuring experts in the Defense, Space & Security arena, Think Tanks, Focus Groups, Executive Round Tables, CEO Breakfasts, and other events – the Agenda is driven by the Members. ​
